price: Ono što vam se prijeteći obećava doista će doći i vi nećete moći umaći.
arabic: إِنَّ مَا تُوعَدُونَ لَأٓتٖۖ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna mā tūʿadūna laātin wamā antum bimuʿ'jizīna
